metadata.title: AI Christmas: The latest devices from Amazon, Meta, Google and more
metadata.description: This holiday shopping season features more advanced smart glasses, smart speakers with generative AI and a pendant users can wear to carry around an AI friend.
metadata.author: Jaures Yip,Kif Leswing,Annie Palmer,Jonathan Vanian
metadata.keywords: Alphabet Class A,Meta Platforms Inc,Microsoft Corp,Amazon.com Inc,EssilorLuxottica SA,Best Buy Co Inc,Target Corp,Uber Technologies Inc,business news
